slide.title: Fallback Encoding

list.bullet: Used if any of the other encoding settings is not set
Easy way of configuring all encoding settings
Defaults to UTF-8 if it's not set

slide.example:
unicode.script_encoding = "UTF-8" Source encoding for your script
unicode.runtime_encoding = "iso-8859-15" Internal encoding used for "native strings"
unicode.from_error_subst_char = "2f" Hex value of substitution character
unicode.http_input_encoding = "UTF-8" Default encoding for HTTP input variables
unicode.output_encoding = "UTF-8" Encoding used for script output
unicode.fallback_encoding = "UTF-8" Fallback encoding
